docs.text: GNR638: Machine Learning for Remote Sensing II Instructor : Prof. Biplab Banerjee Type : Graduate Elective Course Prerequisites : A First course in Machine Learning When : Tue./Fri., 19:00-20:30 in LH 102 Assistants : Saurabh Kumar Moodle link : GNR638 . Overview This is an advanced level course on machine learning motivated via applications to Remote Sensing and Satellite data analysis. In this course, students will learn about various state of the art machine learning techniques from recent research papers. The students are expected to have take a first course in machine learning to better understand the content. Content and Syllabus Review of machine learning fundamentals, Introduction to deep learning, Convolutional networks. News A session on Pytorch is scheduled in the coming week. Assignment 1 is coming soon.
docs.title: GNR638: Machine Learning for Remote Sensing II
